Summary: first thought it was a bright star, then it started coming towards me and got real close. then it went south and looked like it evaporated.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my front deck at 9:30 pm. I was looking at the full moon when I saw a star that was moving to the right, then it started getting closer to where I was. I then realized it wasn't a star. I was mesmerized and watched it keep getting closer, then suddenly it went to the right of my house and disappeared.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Petaluma
There were no other sightings in Petaluma on or around June 22nd 2013
